title: TVS Motor expects growth momentum to continue this fiscal
description: TVS Motor Company expects the premium bikes and scooter segment to grow on the back of a rise in overseas shipments and higher penetration of electric two-wheelers this fiscal. In its Annual Report for 2022-23, the company stated that it maintains a cautiously optimistic view regarding the current fiscal.
